about_the_game:
virtual anchor simulator native music collection

This music set is an uncompressed version of in-game native music in wav format

Compressed MP3 version can get from game file \mod\0000_ Core\music, not need to purchase this DLC

Musician: MoWan

It is estimated that there will be more than 20 music songs in continuous updating
The specific types of plan updates are as follows
Theme song group(default): 8+
Tension group: 2-4
Happy group: 2-4
Congratulation group: 2-4
Loss group: 2-4
